${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Beenade.NAME: Beenade
${modID}:Beenade.DESCRIPTION: Add *Bees to your hand until it is full.
${modID}:Beenade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add *Bees to your hand until its full.

${modID}:Boomstick.NAME: Boomstick
${modID}:Boomstick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:GrapplingHook.NAME: Grappling Hook
${modID}:GrapplingHook.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL MAKE THIS COMMON!!!!

${modID}:MagicMirror.NAME: Magic Mirror
${modID}:MagicMirror.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw !M! cards and gain 1 [E]. NL End your turn.

${modID}:PanicNecklace.NAME: Panic Necklace
${modID}:PanicNecklace.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next Turn gain !B! - 2 Block.

${modID}:TheBeekeeper.NAME: The Beekeeper
${modID}:TheBeekeeper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Bee to your hand. NL MAKE THIS COMMON!!!!
${modID}:TheBeekeeper.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Bees to your hand. NL MAKE THIS COMMON!!!!

${modID}:VampireKnives.NAME: Vampire Knives
${modID}:VampireKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times to ALL enemies. NL Heal HP equal to unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.
